info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 3:24PM EDT until July 20 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Elkhart County in north central Indiana... Northwestern Noble County in northeastern Indiana... Northeastern Kosciusko County in north central Indiana... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 324 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dunlap, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Goshen, Nappanee, Syracuse, Dunlap, Middlebury, Milford, North Webster, Millersburg, New Paris, Benton, Wilmot, Southwest, Foraker, Lake Wawasee, Dewart Lake, Oakwood Park, Waterford Mills, and Gravelton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
